mapper.insert: insert into comments ( post_id, writer_id, content, wrote_at ) values ( #{postId}, #{writerId}, #{content}, now() );
mapper.select: select * from comments where post_id = #{postId} order by wrote_at asc
select c.id, c.post_id, c.writer_id, c.content, c.wrote_at, u.nickname from comments c join users u on c.writer_id = u.id where c.post_id = #{postId} order by c.wrote_at asc
select count(*) from comments where post_id = #{postId}
